name: A Picnic Palaver
description:
A grand escapade of picnics, panic and pandemonium.

Description

Do you have what it takes to fend off the local wildlife of the British countryside? Find out in this chaos-packed game, in which you must protect your picnic from theft! If that wasn't enough, you must do this all whilst stopping your recklessly disloyal German Shepard, Fenton, from running away!

Come check the YouTube channel later for a video on the making of the game! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZV3xm3MHtFOnCTys31pmIQ

Controls

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Swat: Left Click

Call Fenton (the dog): F

Why does this game exist?

This game was made in 7 days for the Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam with the theme 'You are not alone'. 

Credits
  • RobotReaction (me!): Project Leader and Game Designer
  • ChickenChunk579  (https://chickenchunk579.itch.io/): Programming Expert
  • Anonymous: Vocals
